meanings.definition: A person who is bad-tempered or irritable.
meanings.sent1: The crosspatch in the office always complains about everything.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a crosspatch and ruin the fun for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The crosspatch at the party refused to dance and just sat in the corner.
meanings.sent4: Her cat was a little crosspatch, always hissing at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent5: The old man was known as the neighborhood crosspatch, always yelling at kids to stay off his lawn.

meanings.definition: To be in a bad mood or act grumpy.
meanings.sent1: She tends to crosspatch when she's tired and needs some rest.
meanings.sent2: Try not to crosspatch at your friends just because you had a bad day.
meanings.sent3: The toddler began to crosspatch after missing his nap time.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds seemed to crosspatch the sky, darkening the day.
meanings.sent5: His stomach started to crosspatch after eating too much candy.
